mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (location_id, category_id, seller_id, condition_id, status_id, product_name, product_price, product_description) VALUES (#{locationId}, #{categoryId}, #{sellerId}, #{conditionId}, #{statusId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productDescription})
mapper.select: SELECT category_id AS categoryId, category_name AS categoryName FROM product_category ORDER BY category_id
SELECT location_id AS locationId, region FROM location ORDER BY location_id
SELECT condition_id AS conditionId, condition_name AS conditionName FROM product_condition ORDER BY condition_id
SELECT user_id AS userId, price AS productPrice FROM product WHERE product_id = #{productId}
